name: Human
description: Versatile and ambitious, humans are the most common race in most D&D worlds.

traits.versatile: Gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.
traits.extra_feat: Gain an additional feat at 1st level.

name: Dwarf
description: Bold and hardy, dwarves are known as skilled warriors, miners, and workers of stone and metal.

traits.darkvision: You can see in dim light within 60 feet as if it were bright light.
traits.dwarven_resilience: Advantage against poison saves and resistance to poison damage.
traits.stonecunning: Double proficiency bonus on Intelligence (History) checks related to stonework.
